00039 void cleanup(int ret)
00040 {
00041 #ifdef MPI
00042   int task=TASKFIN;
00043   BroadcastTask(&task);
00044 
00045   MPI_Finalize();
00046 #endif
00047 
00048   exit(ret);
00049 }

00052 int main(int argc, char* argv[])

00059   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpisize);
00060 
00061   // fprintf(stderr, "... [%2d] %s\n", mpirank, hostname());
00062 
00063   if (mpirank != 0) {
00064     ProjectionSlave();
00065 
00066     MPI_Finalize();
00067   } else {
00068 #endif
00069 
00070   /* enough arguments ? */
00071 
00072   if (argc < 4) {
00073     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] PROJPAR INTERACTION NUCSFILE"
00074             "\n   -A                show really all eigenstates"

00076             "\n   -l                write Energy Level file"

00100       break;
00101     case 'l':

00164   _setangkappacrit(25.0);

00168   int a,b; 
00169

00177   for (b=0; b<n; b++)

00190   // scale matrix elements

00192     fprintf(stderr, "scaling not yet implemented, aborting\n");

00197   // dimension of many-body basis
00198   // beware: matrix elements are calculated in (possibly) larger basis
00199 
00200   int dim=0;
00201   for (i=0; i<n; i++)

00204 
00205   // read or calculate the Eigenstates

00210   Symmetry Sp;
00211   
00212   int idx=-1;
00213   int ii;
00214   for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00215     for (ii=0; ii<In[i].n; ii++) {

00225         calcEigenstates(&P, &Int, &obsme[i+i*n][idxii+idxii*N], &Ep[idx], threshkmix);

00227         sortEigenstates(&P, &Int, obsp, &Ep[idx], minnormkmix, allp);
00228       }
00229     }
00230 
00231   // solve the n SlaterDet eigenvalue problem
00232   Eigenstates multiE;
00233   Amplitudes multiA;

00235   initAmplitudes(&P, &multiA, dim);
00236   calcMultiEigenstatesMulti(&P, &Int, obsme, 
00237                             Ep, In, n, 
00238                             &multiE, &multiA, threshmulti);
00239 
00240   // calculate expectation values
00241   Observablesod** obs = initprojectedVector(&P, &OpObservables, dim);
00242   calcexpectprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpObservables, obsme, 
00243                                Q, In, n, &multiE, obs);
00244 
00245   // sort Eigenstates
00246   sortEigenstates(&P, &Int, obs, &multiE, minnormmulti, all);
00247 
00248   // output
00249   FILE *outfp;
00250   char outfilename[255];
00251 
00252   snprintf(outfilename, 255, "%s.multi-%s", nucsfile, ProjectiontoStr(&P));
00253   if (!(outfp = fopen(outfilename, "w"))) {
00254     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfilename);
00255     return -1;

00258   fprintinfo(outfp);
00259   fprintProjectinfo(outfp, &P);
00260   fprintf(outfp, "# K-mixing,        threshold: %g, minnorm: %g\n", 
00261           threshkmix, minnormkmix);
00262   fprintf(outfp, "# Diagonalization, threshold: %g, minnorm: %g\n",
00263           threshmulti, minnormmulti);
00264 
00265   // output Observables
00266

00268   SlaterDet Q0;

00271   showprojectedObservables(outfp, &P, &Int, &Q0, obs, &multiE, &multiA, "");
00272 
00273   fclose(outfp);
00274 
00275   writeMultiMulticonfigfile(outfilename, &P, &mbfile, In, n, &multiE);
00276 
00277   // levels output ?
00278   if (levels) {
00279 
00280     snprintf(outfilename, 255, "%s.multi-%s.levels", nucsfile, ProjectiontoStr(&P));

00282       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfilename);
